#scope tag example usage.

= Scopes an unscoped variable to where you want it to be scoped to. =

<script>
function localVarFunction(){ 
var someVar = 69; 
}
</script>

<scope dim="someVar" sender="localVarFunction" receiver="scopeTestFunction" />

<function mk="scopeTestFunction(){
alert('scoped variable: '+ someVar); }" run="0" wait="scope" />
